example[0]: Every beer on the menu was brewed locally.
definition[1]: if a drink of tea or coffee is brewing, the taste is getting into the hot water
example[1]: He read the paper while the tea brewed.
definition[2]: to make a drink of tea or coffee
definition[3]: a drink that is brewed, especially tea
definition[4]: beer, or a can or glass of beer
example[3]: a cold brew in a frosty glass
example[4]: The band played a strange brew of rock, jazz, and country music.
